Detailed Description

template<class ObjectType>
class stDBMCollectionVector< ObjectType >

This class implements a collection of object based on a vector.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvieira@icmc.usp.br)
Todo:
Documentation.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<class ObjectType>
stDBMCollectionVector< ObjectType >::stDBMCollectionVector (  int  hint = 32  )  [inline]
 

This method will create a new instance of this class. The parameter hint is used to prepare this instance to hold at least hint objects (it is not a upper bound limit).

Parameters:
hint The projected number of results (default = 32).
